title: Topic 001 Question 023
body: You have a Fabric tenant that contains a warehouse named Warehouse1. Warehouse1 contains three schemas named schemaA, schemaB, and schemaC.
You need to ensure that a user named User1 can truncate tables in schemaA only.
How should you complete the T-SQL statement? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
